function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of design to limit effects of pandemics in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and public health crises","Mitigation":"Implementing public health-focused design strategies and guidelines","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, touchless technology, and antimicrobial materials","People":"Public, city planners, architects, urban developers, and policymakers","Owner":"Architects, city planners, urban developers, and policymakers"},{"Description":"Changes in architecture and urban planning due to fear of infection","Impact":"Potential negative impact on aesthetics, functionality, and social interaction","Mitigation":"Balancing health-focused design with aesthetic and functional considerations","Technologies":"Biophilic design, smart city technology, and mixed-use developments","People":"Architects, urban planners, designers, and developers","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and designers"},{"Description":"Cities being tested during the pandemic","Impact":"Revealing vulnerabilities in city infrastructure and management","Mitigation":"Improving crisis management and resilience in urban environments","Technologies":"Smart city technology, data analytics, and emergency response systems","People":"City residents, municipal governments, emergency responders, and urban planners","Owner":"Municipal governments, urban planners, and emergency responders"},{"Description":"Lack of sustainable development goals focused on human health","Impact":"Neglect of public health in urban development and planning","Mitigation":"Incorporating human health as a core pillar of sustainable development goals","Technologies":"Health impact assessments, wellness-oriented design, and community health initiatives","People":"Public health advocates, policymakers, and sustainability experts","Owner":"Policymakers and sustainability experts"}]}
